author: James Van Straten
title: Tom Lee Mulls Roughed-Up Semler Scientific for 'Granny Shot' Portfolio
description: The bitcoin treasury company's market cap has tumbled below the value of its BTC holdings.
content: The recent wave of companies adding bitcoin to their balance sheets has not yielded universally positive results. Semler Scientific (SMLR), a medical technology firm that pivoted into bitcoin treasur… [+1349 chars]
